cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nagasu

sentence.kanji: 彼女は涙を流したんだ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha namida wo nagashita n da
sentence.english: She shed tears.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tensai

sentence.kanji: 彼は笑いの天才だね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha warai no tensai da ne
sentence.english: He's a comic genius.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bengo

sentence.kanji: 友人が私を弁護してくれました。
sentence.romaji: yuujin ga watashi wo bengo shite kuremashita
sentence.english: My friend defended me.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bengoshi

sentence.kanji: 父は弁護士です。
sentence.romaji: chichi ha bengoshi desu
sentence.english: My father's a lawyer.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kango

sentence.kanji: この病院は24時間看護です。
sentence.romaji: kono byouin ha nijuuyojikan kango desu
sentence.english: This hospital has around-the-clock care.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kiken

sentence.kanji: 彼は試合の途中で棄権したぞ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha shiai no tochuu de kiken shita zo
sentence.english: He sat out during the game.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zaisei

sentence.kanji: 国の財政はとても苦しい状態だな。
sentence.romaji: kuni no zaisei ha totemo kurushii joutai da na
sentence.english: The country's finances are in a very tight condition.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shiji

sentence.kanji: 彼は国民の支持を得たのよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kokumin no shiji wo eta no yo
sentence.english: He won the people's support.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's son

sentence.kanji: パチンコで5000円損しました。
sentence.romaji: pachinko de 5000 en son shimashita
sentence.english: I lost 5,000 yen at pachinko.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sonsuru

sentence.kanji: わざわざ行って損した。
sentence.romaji: wazawaza ite son shita
sentence.english: I wasted my time going to all that trouble.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ita

sentence.kanji: 父は長い板を買って来たんだ。
sentence.romaji: chichi ha nagai ita wo kate kita n da
sentence.english: My father bought a long plank.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanban

sentence.kanji: 店の看板を塗り替えました。
sentence.romaji: mise no kanban wo nurikaemashita
sentence.english: I repainted the shop's sign.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's manaita

sentence.kanji: 魚を切った後、まな板を洗ったの。
sentence.romaji: sakana wo kita ato、 manaita wo arata no
sentence.english: I washed the cutting board after cutting fish.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oyobu

sentence.kanji: あなたにまで迷惑が及んでごめんなさい。
sentence.romaji: anata ni made meiwaku ga oyonde gomennasai
sentence.english: I'm sorry that even you've been inconvenienced.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sebiro

sentence.kanji: 背広をクリーニングに出しました。
sentence.romaji: sebiro wo kuri-ningu ni dashimashita
sentence.english: I took my suit to the dry cleaner.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's egaku

sentence.kanji: 彼は人物を描くのがうまいな。
sentence.romaji: kare ha jinbutsu wo egaku no ga umai na
sentence.english: He is good at drawing people.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hajimari

sentence.kanji: いよいよ劇の始まりですね。
sentence.romaji: iyoiyo geki no hajimari desu ne
sentence.english: The play is about to start.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's wareware

sentence.kanji: 我々の決意は固いです。
sentence.romaji: wareware no ketsui ha katai desu
sentence.english: Our decision is firm.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's teigi

sentence.kanji: 美しさを定義してください。
sentence.romaji: utsukushisa wo teigi shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please define beauty.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's itaru

sentence.kanji: ようやく結論に至ったようね
sentence.romaji: youyaku ketsuron ni itata you ne
sentence.english: It seemed that we finally reached a conclusion.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ichi

sentence.kanji: 皆の意見が一致しました。
sentence.romaji: minna no iken ga ichi shimashita
sentence.english: We all agreed in opinion.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's itasu

sentence.kanji: 私からご連絡致します。
sentence.romaji: watashi kara gorenraku itashimasu
sentence.english: I'll get in touch with you.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's touchaku

sentence.kanji: 夜9時に東京に到着しました。
sentence.romaji: yoru 9 ji ni toukyou ni touchaku shimashita
sentence.english: I arrived at Tokyo at 9 pm.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saka

sentence.kanji: この坂を上るのはすごくきついね。
sentence.romaji: kono saka wo noboru no ha sugoku kitsui ne
sentence.english: Going up this slope is very hard.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's katasa

sentence.kanji: 理科の時間に石の硬さを比べたよ。
sentence.romaji: rika no jikan ni ishi no katasa wo kurabeta yo
sentence.english: In science class we compared the hardness of stones.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ikari

sentence.kanji: 彼ったら怒り爆発だったよ。
sentence.romaji: kare tara ikari bakuhatsu data yo
sentence.english: He blew his stack.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kougi

sentence.kanji: 彼の発言に対してたくさんの抗議があったよ。
sentence.romaji: kare no hatsugen ni taishite takusan no kougi ga ata yo
sentence.english: His remark was met with numerous complaints.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsumekiri

sentence.kanji: 爪切りを取ってください。
sentence.romaji: tsumekiri wo tote kudasai
sentence.english: Please pass me the nail clipper.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's eda

sentence.kanji: 強風で木の枝が折れた。
sentence.romaji: kyoufuu de ki no eda ga oreta
sentence.english: The tree branch broke in the strong wind.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ukabu

sentence.kanji: 沖にボートが浮かんでいます。
sentence.romaji: oki ni bo-to ga ukande imasu
sentence.english: The boat is floating off the coast.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jouryuu

sentence.kanji: 上流には滝があります。
sentence.romaji: jouryuu ni ha taki ga arimasu
sentence.english: There is a waterfall upstream.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's karyuu

sentence.kanji: 下流に小さな滝があるよ。
sentence.romaji: karyuu ni chiisa na taki ga aru yo
sentence.english: There is a small waterfall downstream.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hiroba

sentence.kanji: 広場に子供が沢山集まっていたよ。
sentence.romaji: hiroba ni kodomo ga takusan atsumate ita yo
sentence.english: A lot of children had gathered in the plaza.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kuki

sentence.kanji: チューリップは茎が長いです。
sentence.romaji: chu-ripu ha kuki ga nagai desu
sentence.english: The tulip's stalk is long.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakaeru

sentence.kanji: 彼は大きな荷物を抱えているわ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ooki na nimotsu wo kakaete iru wa
sentence.english: He is carrying some large luggage.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's idaku

sentence.kanji: 少年よ大志を抱け。
sentence.romaji: shounen yo taishi wo idake
sentence.english: Boys, be ambitious.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ikuji

sentence.kanji: 彼女は育児で忙しいよ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha ikuji de isogashii yo
sentence.english: She is busy looking after her children.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kokorogakeru

sentence.kanji: 安全運転を心掛けてください。
sentence.romaji: anzen unten wo kokorogakete kudasai
sentence.english: Please remember to drive safely.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hanashikakeru

sentence.kanji: 知らない人が話し掛けてきた。
sentence.romaji: shiranai hito ga hanashikakete kita
sentence.english: A stranger came up and spoke to me.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yorikakaru

sentence.kanji: 彼はフェンスに寄り掛かったの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha fuensu ni yorikakata no 。
sentence.english: He leant against the fence.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shiki

sentence.kanji: 彼がそのプロジェクトの指揮を取ったの。
sentence.romaji: kare ga sono purojiekuto no shiki wo tota no
sentence.english: He took the initiative on that project.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keikai

sentence.kanji: 地震のあとは津波に警戒してください。
sentence.romaji: jishin no ato ha tsunami ni keikai shite kudasai
sentence.english: Beware of tsunamis after an earthquake.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hankan

sentence.kanji: 俺たちは彼の言動に反感を持ったね。
sentence.romaji: oretachi ha kare no gendou ni hankan wo mota ne
sentence.english: We had negative feelings towards his conduct.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's atsukau

sentence.kanji: この荷物は丁寧に扱って下さい。
sentence.romaji: kono nimotsu ha teinei ni atsukate kudasai
sentence.english: Please handle this luggage with care.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ayashii

sentence.kanji: その男の行動は怪しかったわ。
sentence.romaji: sono otoko no koudou ha ayashikata wa
sentence.english: That man's behavior was suspicious.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ayashimu

sentence.kanji: 警察はそのグループを怪しんでいます。
sentence.romaji: keisatsu ha sono guru-pu wo ayashinde imasu
sentence.english: The police are suspicious of the group.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yuudai

sentence.kanji: 雄大な景色に感動したの。
sentence.romaji: yuudai na keshiki ni kandou shita no
sentence.english: I was impressed by the magnificent scenery.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toutatsu

sentence.kanji: ついに山頂に到達しました。
sentence.romaji: tsuini sanchou ni toutatsu shimashita
sentence.english: We finally reached the top of the mountain.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shougakukin

sentence.kanji: 彼女は奨学金で大学に行きました。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha shougakukin de daigaku ni ikimashita
sentence.english: She went to university on a scholarship.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's osu

sentence.kanji: うちの猫は雄です。
sentence.romaji: uchi no neko ha osu desu
sentence.english: Our cat is a male.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kawaigaru

sentence.kanji: 彼女は猫を可愛がっています。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha neko wo kawaigate imasu
sentence.english: She cherishes her cat.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ganjou

sentence.kanji: 錠を頑丈なものに替えました。
sentence.romaji: jou wo ganjou na mono ni kaemashita
sentence.english: The lock was substituted for a stronger one.
